sqlMap.select: select l.USERNAME as username,u.ID as id,u.LONGIN_ID as loginId,u.EMAIL as email,u.QQ as qq from t_login l LEFT JOIN t_userinfo u on l.ID = u.LONGIN_ID ORDER BY l.USERNAME DESC LIMIT #paging.startRecord#,#paging.pageSize#
select count(1) from t_login l LEFT JOIN t_userinfo u on l.ID = u.LONGIN_ID ORDER BY l.USERNAME DESC LIMIT #paging.startRecord#,#paging.pageSize#
sqlMap.update: update t_userinfo set email=#email#,qq=#qq# where LONGIN_ID = #loginId#
sqlMap.select: select id,username,email,qq from t_userinfo where LONGIN_ID = #loginID#
